data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Taurages, Lithuania into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Taurages, Lithuania
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Taurages, Lithuania.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 87,097 people in the state of Taurages who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Taurages, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Kazakh people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kazakh people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kazakh people is yours.
Father, encourage the 1,482 believers in Taurages to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Taurages. Through your servants plant 20 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 1,482 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Taurages
